entry.title: DFIR & SOC - Roadmap (From Zero To Hero)
entry.summary: SOC & DFIR Roadmap Introduction I know—you’ve seen countless roadmaps for starting a cybersecurity career. But let’s face it: any path can get you there if you stick with it. Here’s my suggested route to help you stay on track and avoid getting lost. Zero Level: Building the Foundation 1. Introduction to Cybersecurity Goal: Understand the basics of cybersecurity, including fundamental concepts, terminology, and the overall landscape. Resources: Free: Introduction to Cyber Security - FutureLearn (Free Course) Cybersecurity Essentials - Cisco Networking Academy (Free with Registration) Practice: Complete beginner challenges on TryHackMe to apply basic cybersecurity concepts.
